tests.report: - The website is great on privacy!
tests.report_sec:
- HTTPS by default is good! ( 5.00 rating )
- HTTP Strict Transport Security HSTS is good! ( 5.00 rating )
- Content Security Policy is good! ( 5.00 rating )
- Reporting CSP Certificate Transparency Network Error Logging is good! ( 5.00 rating )
- Referrer Policy is good! ( 5.00 rating )
- Subresource Integrity SRI is good! ( 5.00 rating )
- HTTP headers is good! ( 5.00 rating )
- Cookies is good! ( 5.00 rating )

HTTP Strict Transport Security HSTS.more_info: HSTS policy for https://krompaconu: max-age31536000 includeSubDomains preload

Content Security Policy.more_info: Content Security Policy set in HTTP header: default-src none base-uri self script-src none img-src self style-src self font-src self form-action none frame-src none connect-src self media-src self child-src self frame-ancestors none worker-src none manifest-src none

Reporting CSP Certificate Transparency N.more_info: Reports are not sent to a third-party

Referrer Policy.more_info: Referrer Policy set to no-referrer in Referrer-Policy HTTP header

Subresource Integrity SRI.more_info: Subresource Integrity SRI not implemented but all resources are loaded from a similar origin

HTTP headers.more_info: To enable these headers youll need to add them to your web server configuration This is a simple change Exactly how you do it depends on what server you use This page developermozillaorg has configuration examples for Apache Nginx and IIS
